title: Duke Nukem 3D: Kill-A-Ton Collection
description:
Team 1984 presents...

Duke Nukem 3D: Kill-A-Ton Collection

As usual,
The good folks at Team 1984
Have packaged this as 
Three (3) .ISO files
No rar bullshit
No password bullshit
No shitty rips or worthless cracks
JUst whole game goodness
Without the fillers...

Synopsis

{*Duke Nukem3D: Kill-A-Ton Collection] bundles all previous Duke Nukem games in one package. Included are the first two platforms games, {*Duke Nukem} and {*Duke Nukem II}, plus the full version of {*Duke Nukem 3D} and two of its expansion packs, {*Duke Nukem 3D: Atomic Edition} and {*Duke Nukem 3D: Plutonium PAK}. Also included is {*Duke Xtreme}, a collection of 50 separate levels, {*Duke!Zone II} containing three new episodes, and {*Duke it out in D.C.}, another new episode in which {%Duke} must rescue the President from alien attack. A bonus level editor allows you to design your own levels and alien enemies.

The Duke Nukem 3D Kill-A-Ton package is the ultimate collection of Duke Nukem. Featuring every authorized Duke Nukem title released as of now, the Duke Nukem 3D: Kill-A-Ton Collection is a must-have holiday gift for Duke Nukem fans or anyone who wants to experience the entire interactive portfolio of one of the most popular characters in interactive gaming history. The package includes: Duke Nukem I, Duke Nukem II, Duke Nukem 3D (which includes the Duke Nukem Level Editor), Duke Nukem 3D: Plutonium Pak, Duke It Out In DC, Duke Extreme, Duke! Zone II, Duke Nukem - Unlock The Secrets (an interactive strategy guide) and Duke Nukem Windows95 Desktop themes and screen savers.


SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
MINIMUM PC REQUIREMENTS
Minimum CPU Speed: 66 MHz
Minimum RAM Required: 8 MB
Minimum Hard Disk Space: 40 MB
Minimum OS Version: 5.0
Graphics Type: VGA
Graphics Resolution: 640x480
Color Depth: 256 Colors
